projects.heading2: Copying the Love Live Group Ranking Web Page
projects.description: This front-end project creates a web page based on screenshots from a website shown in an anime.

projects.heading2: Copying the Love Live School idol logo
projects.description: This pure css3 animated logo mini-project copies the animated logo seen in promotional videos for the Japanese entertainment property ‘Love Live School idol project’.
projects.thumb1_alt: Thumbnail image of CSS3 letter animation

projects.description: This AngularJS app displays a list of costume contests. The data is from an external REST API. Links from those contests display a list of entries and winner results.
A Ruby on Rails application setup to give clients costume contest results data in json format. This uses the active_model_serializers gem and the rack-cors gem.
projects.thumb1_alt: Thumbnail image of rest api results as viewed in a browser.
projects.thumb2_alt: Thumbnail image of rest api results as viewed in a browser.

projects.description: This chart project uses the d3.js library and visualizes the professional career knockouts of retired boxer ‘Iron’ Mike Tyson.
projects.thumb1_alt: Thumbnail image of d3 js chart that displays Mike Tyson's KO times.
projects.thumb2_alt: Thumbnail image of rest api results as viewed in a browser.

projects.description: This pure css project imitates the backdrop of tv screens that are seen in a promotional video for the Japanese entertainment franchise 'Love Live School Idol'.
projects.thumb1_alt: Thumbnail image of the CSS mini project that imitates a prop seen in the Japanese Anime 'Love Live School Idol'.
projects.thumb2_alt: Thumbnail image of screenshot from Love Live School Idol promotional video.
